body: Hi Ben! Thanks for checking. Let's try again. Can you send me a screen capture so I see which one causes the issue? Something like the image below. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/BM3*tIQqFL*TeniTWxjVfzco3UpsHYu852av3gZ5Ara1i77nlHjrcyu1oOXDwQZonMPKTY*tPBHDuFP5G*HAwrwzWD979QVe/take_off_time.PNG) If components don't show the timing you can turn it on from Display>Canvas Widgets > Profiler
